content.new:
Deadline: September 13.

* Phase 1:  
  ☐ Prepare for tech support weekend prior to deadline \(23rd is a Monday\)

    ☐ Review video submissions



    ☐ Publish results and make announcement, provided some fun/creative prizes, post/embedded videos   
    ☐ Press release


* Pre-phase 2:

    ☐ Create .yaml file for task 1



    ☐ Create .yaml file for task 2



    ☐ Create .yaml file for task 3



    ☐ Create .yaml file for task 4



    ☐ Create .yaml file for task 5



    ☐ Create .yaml file for task 6



    ☐ Dry-run of the automated evaluation with our own two solutions \(Tyler and Rumman\)



    * ☐ WAM-V generation
    * ☐ Task generation
    * ☐ Running competition
    * ☐ Upload logs to S3
    * ☐ Optional: Generate some videos
    

    ☐ Explore running the automated evaluation on AWS
